onboarding.helping_family: I'm fine, just helping someone in my family üòä
onboarding.screen1_description: You are not aloneüíô There are millions who share your journey, your strength, and your dreams. Check out our role models ‚Äì people who prove every day that life with a disability can be powerful, inspiring, and full of possibilities. Together, we rise. Together, we thrive. üåü
onboarding.screen2_description:
Disability ‚â† Disease

Don‚Äôt treat someone with a disability like a patient waiting to be cured.
A patient needs treatment. But a person with a disability needs to learn how to adapt and live fully.
Don‚Äôt leave them isolated at home. Take them out, include them, support them‚Ä¶
onboarding.screen3_title: Thank You for Caring and Wanting to Learn!
onboarding.screen3_description:
People with disabilities often have the kindest and strongest souls. ‚ù§Ô∏è They want to connect, engage, and share life ‚Äì just like anyone else.
Treat them with respect. Give them equal chances. Include them in laughter, conversations, and experiences ‚Äì not pity.
Because what they truly want is simple: To be seen as equals. To be treated as humans first. üåü

sign_language.sorry_desc: Make a fist and rub it in a circular motion over your chest.
sign_language.iloveyou_desc: Raise your pinky finger, index finger, and thumb while keeping the other fingers folded down.
sign_language.please_desc: Place your flat hand on your chest and move it in a circle.
sign_language.yes_desc: Make a fist and move it up and down.
sign_language.good_night_desc: Hold one hand flat like the

about.mission_desc: To empower individuals within the disability community by offering a comprehensive suite of accessible tools, invaluable resources, and enriching educational content. We strive to foster independence, enhance communication, and promote inclusivity.
about.story_desc: Hand by Hand was born from a desire to address the everyday challenges faced by people with disabilities. We identified critical gaps in communication and accessibility and embarked on a journey to create solutions that genuinely make life easier and more fulfilling.
about.feature1: Intuitive Sign Language Learning: Master sign language through interactive lessons and practical exercises.
about.feature2: Accessible Places Locator: Discover nearby locations with disability-friendly amenities.
about.feature3: Inspiring Role Models: Connect with and learn from individuals who have overcome challenges and achieved success.

community.chat_desc: Chat with other users in the community
community.social_desc: Share and discover posts from the community

help_support.faq1: How do I use the Sign Language Learning feature?
help_support.freq1desc: Navigate to the 'Learn Sign Language' section from the main menu. You'll find interactive lessons and quizzes to help you learn.
help_support.faq2: How does the accessible messaging work?
help_support.freq2desc: The messaging feature is designed with accessibility in mind, offering options like larger text, voice-to-text, and screen reader compatibility. You can find it under 'Messages'.
help_support.faq3: How can I find role models in the app?
help_support.freq3desc: The 'Role Models' section showcases inspiring individuals from the disability community. You can read their stories and connect with them if they have chosen to share contact information.
help_support.faq4: How do I find disability-friendly places?
help_support.freq4desc: Use the 'Accessible Places' feature. You can search for locations and filter by accessibility features. Users can also contribute by adding and rating places.
help_support.support_message: If you can't find the answer you're looking for, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team. We're here to help!

general.be_the_first_to_share: Be the first to share something!
